Package org.apache.fulcrum.json.jackson

Class Jackson2MapperService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.avalon.framework.logger.AbstractLogEnabled
      • org.apache.fulcrum.json.jackson.Jackson2MapperService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.avalon.framework.activity.Initializable, org.apache.avalon.framework.configuration.Configurable, org.apache.avalon.framework.logger.LogEnabled, JsonService
    public class Jackson2MapperService
extends org.apache.avalon.framework.logger.AbstractLogEnabled
implements JsonService, org.apache.avalon.framework.activity.Initializable, org.apache.avalon.framework.configuration.Configurable
    By default multiple serialization of the same object in a single thread is not supported (e.g filter + mixin or default + filter for the same bean / object). By default a filter is defined by its Class.getName(). Note: If using SimpleNameIntrospector, filter caches are set by class id. Caching is enabled by default, if not (a) by setting cacheFilters to false. By setting (b) the Boolean parameter clean serializeAllExceptFilter(Object, Class, Boolean, String...) or serializeOnlyFilter(Object, Class, Boolean, String...) you could clean the filter. If caching is disabled each filter will be unregistered and the cache cleaned.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Georg Kallidis

      • serializeAllExceptFilter

        public <T> String serializeAllExceptFilter​(Object src,
                                           Class<T>[] filterClasses,
                                           Boolean clean,
                                           String... filterAttr)
                                    throws Exception
        Type Parameters:
        T - class type
        Parameters:
        src - the object to be serailized, may be a list
        filterClasses - the same object class or a detail class, which should be filtered
        clean - cleaning the cache after serialization
        filterAttr - attributes to be filtered for filtered class
        Returns:
        the serailized string
        Throws:
        Exception - generic exception
